projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.
status.name: Open

fields.description:
https://forums.aws.amazon.com/ann.jspa?annID=6776

S3 is deprecating accessing S3 via {{s3.amazonaws.com/<bucketname>/key}} in favour of {{<bucketname>.s3.amazonaws.com/key}}, I believe this will affect appc-mobilesdk-server and titaniumlib fetching the releases.json file. 

cc [~cb1kenobi]
fields.summary: Investigate potential breakage from S3 path style deprecation

comments.body:
I've updated titaniumlib https://github.com/appcelerator/titaniumlib/pull/13.

node-ios-device v1 references appc-node-binaries.s3.amazonaws.com, so that's good to go.

node-ios-device v2 uses prebuilds and does not publish to S3.
